Do Not download the game if you play on a laptop as it will not run properly.

• OS: Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1) or Windows 8
• CPU: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5-750 / 2.7 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 805
• RAM: At least 4 GB
• DISC DRIVE: DVD ROM drive required for installation only
• HARD DRIVE: At least 21 GB of free space
• VIDEO: graphics card with 1 GB Video RAM or better / NVidia GTX560 or AMD Radeon HD5870

taylorswiftfreak: uh, no that's wrong. of course it will run on a laptop as long as it meets the specs, just like any desktop. why wouldn't it?

finnr2008: don't answer questions that you don't know the answer to. his HD 7670m will run it fine! it's on par with a geforce 9600 GT which was a very powerful card when this game came out in 2008. when this game was released, i was still using an old geforce 7300 GT which is a real piece of crap, and it ran this game at around 20 FPS with all low graphics settings in 800x600.

oh shit, my mistake. i must look stupid correcting people now. i didn't know the 2013 actually had updated graphics!

to the guy with the HD 7670m, no i doubt it would work well. you should download the original 2008 version of this game. that will run well on your system.
